oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The power of Game Sorcerers continues after death. Prayer addressed to them by the mother of narrator. (L V.
4809 rev.). Dia!kwain's mother tells of spirit

people who are dead game's sorcerers. The people do not see them but their sorcery is still around and they do not altogether die. There follows her prayer to the spirits of the sorcerers who formerly possessed game.
